sentence: His essays are models of clarity and brevity.

sentence: Gathered all together in this church, we commemorate those who lost their lives in the war.

sentence: We can't afford to become complacent about any of our products.

sentence: Aluminium has good heat conductivity.

translation: taktowny, liczący się z innymi [kind and helpful]
sentence: It wasn't very considerate of you to drink all the milk.

translation: przekazywać, komunikować [to express a thought, feeling, or idea so that it is understood by other people]
sentence: His poetry conveys a great sense of religious devotion.

sentence: They are all deciduous, and there is little if any undergrowth.
